data.title: Hexagonal Architecture: three principles and an implementation example - OCTO Talks !
data.description: Documented in 2005 by Alistair Cockburn, Hexagonal Architecture is a software architecture that has many advantages and has seen renewed interest since 2015. The original intent of Hexagonal Architecture is: Allow an application to equally be driven by users, programs, automated test or batch scriptâ€¦
data.author: Erwan Alliaume
